head.description: This file contains natural language, web and SPARQL query queries for querying a hybrid data sources.

queries.en_query: Give me the books available for the book whose title is Arsène Lupin, Gentleman Burglar and whose author is Maurice Leblanc
queries.hybrid_query:
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX dbr: <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?microdata ?offer ?bookName

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
?book dbo:author <http://dbpedia.org/resource/Maurice_Leblanc> .
?book foaf:name "Arsène Lupin, Gentleman Burglar"@en .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
?offer schema:availability ?availability .
VALUES ?availability {
 "https://schema.org/Instock" "http://schema.org/InStock" "https://schema.org/InStock" "InStock" 
} .
?microdata schema:name ?bookName .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10

queries.en_query: Give me the price of the books available for the book whose title is Arsène Lupin, Gentleman Burglar and whose author is Maurice Leblanc

?web md:containsThing ?book .
?web md:containsWord "purchase" .

?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
?offer schema:availability ?availability .
VALUES ?availability {
 "https://schema.org/Instock" "http://schema.org/InStock" "https://schema.org/InStock" "InStock"

?offer schema:price ?price .

}

LIMIT 10

queries.en_query: Give me the price of every book written by the author of Arsène Lupin, Gentleman Burglar
queries.hybrid_query:
PREFIX foaf: <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
PREFIX dbo: <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
PREFIX schema: <https://schema.org/>
PREFIX md: <http://mekano.org/>

SELECT DISTINCT ?book ?web ?microdata ?offer ?price

WHERE {

?book a dbo:Book .
?book dbo:author ?author .
?book_1 a dbo:Book .
?book_1 dbo:author ?author .
?book_1 foaf:name "Arsène Lupin, Gentleman Burglar"@en .
?web md:containsThing ?book .
?web md:containsWord "purchase" .
?web md:hasMicrodata ?microdata .
?microdata schema:offers ?offer .
?offer schema:price ?price .

}
ORDER BY ASC(?book)
LIMIT 10
